00032 #ifndef HASHTABLE_H
00033 #define HASHTABLE_H
00034 
00035 #include <stdlib.h>
00036 #include <stdio.h>
00037 #include <string.h>
00038 
00039 #include "MiniHashTable.h"
00040 
00041 #define INITIAL_SIZE    1048576
00042 #define SEED    1159241
00043 
00044 #define HASHFN  bitwisehash
00045 
00046 typedef struct hashrec {
00047     char *word; //or suffix
00048     int count;
00049     bool shared;
00050     unsigned int id;
00051     unsigned int new_id;
00052     MINIHASHREC* prefix;
00053     struct hashrec *next;
00054 } HASHREC;
00055 
00056 class HashTable {
00057 public:
00058     HashTable();
00059     unsigned int TSIZE;
00060     bool countOriginalOrder;
00061     void inithashtable(bool countOrder);
00062     void inithashtable(unsigned int size, bool countOrder);
00063     HASHREC ** get();
00064     HASHREC * get(unsigned pos);
00065     HASHREC * hashsearch(char *w);
00066     HASHREC * hashsearch(HASHREC* rec); //search an equivalent element
00067     void delete_key(char *w);
00068     HASHREC * hashinsert(char *w, unsigned int &globalId, MINIHASHREC* prefix); //insert not shared, prefix or not
00069     HASHREC * hashinsert(HASHREC* shared, unsigned int &globalId); //insert shared
00070     void dump();
00071     unsigned int bitwisehash(char *word, unsigned int tsize, unsigned int seed);
00072     int scmp(HASHREC* rec, char *s2);
00073     ~HashTable();
00074     unsigned int size();
00075 private:
00076     HASHREC **hash;
00077     int numNodes;
00078 };
